Safety of Toys

March 8, 2013
PHASE 1: Does the Safety of Toys Directive Apply to Your Product? This overview of the Safety of Toys Directive is currently being developed. For additional information on this directive, please contact either of the U.S. Department of Commerce's EU Specialists: Bob Straetz at 202-482-4496 or Sylvia Mohr at 011 32 2 508 2675.   <!--SS_END_CLOSEREGIONMARKER(region1)-->   <!--SS_BEGIN_SNIPPET(fragment11,Presentation)--><!-- Code Added to have buyusa home pages move to export.gov --><!-- New Code Ended --><!--SS_END_SNIPPET(fragment11,Presentation)--><!--SS_BEGIN_SNIPPET(fragment16,Presentation)--><!--SS_END_SNIPPET(fragment16,Presentation)--><!--SS_BEGIN_SNIPPET(fragment15,Presentation)--><!--SS_END_SNIPPET(fragment15,Presentation)--><!--SS_BEGIN_SNIPPET(fragment18,Presentation)--><!--SS_END_SNIPPET(fragment18,Presentation)--><!--SS_BEGIN_SNIPPET(fragment19,Presentation)--><!--SS_END_SNIPPET(fragment19,Presentation)--><!--SS_BEGIN_SNIPPET(fragment17,Presentation)--><!--SS_END_SNIPPET(fragment17,Presentation)-->
